Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Frequently \Fre*quent*ly\, adv. At frequent or short intervals; many times; often; repeatedly; commonly. [1913 Webster]
frequently adv : many times at short intervals; "we often met over a cup of coffee" [syn: {often}, {oftentimes}, {oft}, {ofttimes}] [ant: {rarely}, {infrequently}]
